items.sentence: I\'m having a hard time believing Tom did that.
I regretted having wasted a great deal of time.
Tom says he doesn\'t want to talk about school.
Tom says he doesn\'t want to work here anymore.
I wonder whether Tom was here yesterday or not.
I wonder whether Tom will come tomorrow or not.
I wonder whether or not Tom did that yesterday.
Tom saw something out of the corner of his eye.
Tom was arrested by an off-duty police officer.
I said I might be going to Boston next weekend.
